entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
